doc.title: The Benny Hill Show

credit.role: Wanda the Wicked West Whickam Whip Woman
Girl at Bus Stop/Girl Chased with Net
Muscleman in 'Ye Olde Wishing Well' Sketch
Member of Scuttle's Keep Fit Brigade
Member of Scuttle's Keep Fit Brigade

doc.plot: A sketch-comedy series in which Hill would often play multiple characters and satirize popular British and American performers and stars. Common themes in the show were the husband-beating wife, buxom women, and silent, high-speed chase scenes between Hill and the other characters.
